Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: no loaded talkpad' on quit
If forcefadeout == false AND level is not zero AND brightness < fadetime ELSE GOTO 00000308
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000502
If actor_spawnerid == newvalue AND actor_uniqueid != newvalue ELSE GOTO 00000772
Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001178
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001290
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001378
If camera_x < Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001548
If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001620
If camera_y < Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001690
If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001760
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00001882
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00002024
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002160
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002322
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit
If Camera_XMin > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002790
If Camera_XMax > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002852
If Camera_YMin > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002906
If Camera_YMax > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002968
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003152
If audiodriver == audiodriver_ptplayer OR audiodriver == audiodriver_mdsdrv ELSE GOTO 00003356
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003460
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003516
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003612
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003774
If Test bit megadrive_start on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003852
If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003912
If Test bit megadrive_start on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003906
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004272
If displaydirty & displaydirty_regenerate is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004638
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004842
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If IsNTSC is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004978
Print 'Y Resolution of 240 is not supported on NTSC Mega Drive' on quit
Print 'Y Resolution of {yres} is not supported on Mega Drive, only 224 (any) and 240 (pal)' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00005198
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005264
If panel is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005552
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005552
If panel_bottom is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005594
If panel_top is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005656
If control1_buttons|control2_buttons|control3fire|control4fire is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006116
If control1_buttons is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006262
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006386
If actor_x >= camera_x + xres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006534
Say 'This is a simple sample to demonstrate printing strings'
Say 'This appears to be a Sega Genesis or Japan Mega Drive'
Say 'This appears to be European Mega Drive'
Say 'I'm going to try loading a save file'
Say 'Loaded file. Last random number was {lastdice}'
Say 'Could not load file (first time running this program?)'

Say 'I'm going to pick a number between 1 and 99...<5>
{Dice}'
Say 'use < 1 ><10> to < 5 ><20> to insert <30> delays <40> in <50> text!'

Say 'Next is a demo of choices.
Yes to repeat
No to quit.
'
If repeated is not zero ELSE GOTO 00008542
Say 'I'm going to try saving that number - {dice} - to disk for next time'
Print 'We can also print a quit message. Last dice roll was {dice}.' on quit
